name: Hold The Line (Jeff Campbell)
description:
A short, wave-based shooter with some base building elements. Shoot aliens, gather energy cubes, spend them on base upgrades (turrets, barriers, etc). 

Game Length: about 15 - 30 minutes.

CONTROLS

Left click - shoot

WASD/Arrow Keys - move

Spacebar - Jump

Esc - pause menu

E - Interact with terminals

F - throw mine (after purchasing Armory)

X - Call airstrike (after purchasing Communication Station)

MUSIC ATTRIBUTION

Hiding Your Reality by Kevin MacLeod
